document.full_text: investors such as carl icahn, dish network, monarch alternative capital and sk telecom are looking at the assets of blockbuster in bankruptcy. the company's fate may be decided in court late monday.
document.title: the bidding over blockbuster
lines_and_colors: investors such as carl icahn, dish network, monarch alternative capital and sk telecom are looking at the assets of blockbuster in bankruptcy. the company's fate may be decided in court late monday.
